description: Filmmaker Paul Ballard stitches together things from his life and attempts to make some connections, some sense of things.
quote: I’m trying to find what’s real, what’s honest.
altHero: a grid of stills of everyday life like a teapot, watch, and phone
alt1: a man’s reflection in a mirror films from behind a camera
alt2: the filmmaker talks and looks off camera
alt3: a woman’s arms adjust a plant on a window sill
alt4: a woman in a flight attendant uniform looks at the camera
